DTrack2.cpp

00001 /* DTrack2SDK: C++ source file, A.R.T. GmbH 3.5.07-13.5.11
00002  *
00003  * DTrack2: functions to receive and process DTrack UDP packets (ASCII protocol), as
00004  * well as to exchange DTrack2 TCP command strings.
00005  * Copyright (C) 2007-2011, Advanced Realtime Tracking GmbH
00006  * 
00007  * This library is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
00008  * modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public
00009  * License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either
00010  * version 2.1 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
00011  * 
00012  * This library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
00013  * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
00014  * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU
00015  * Lesser General Public License for more details.
00016  * 
00017  * You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public
00018  * License along with this library; if not, write to the Free Software
00019  * Foundation, Inc., 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA  02111-1307  USA
00020  *
00021  *
00022  * Version v2.0.2
00023  *
00024  * Purpose:
00025  *  - receives DTrack UDP packets (ASCII protocol) and converts them into easier to handle data
00026  *  - sends and receives DTrack2 commands (TCP)
00027  *  - DTrack2 network protocol due to: 'Technical Appendix DTrack v2.0'
00028  *  - for ARTtrack Controller versions v0.2 (and compatible versions)
00029  *  - tested under Linux (gcc) and MS Windows 2000/XP (MS Visual C++)
00030  *
00031  * Usage:
00032  *  - for Linux, Unix:
00033  *    - comment '#define OS_WIN', uncomment '#define OS_UNIX' in file 'DTrack2.cpp'
00034  *  - for MS Windows:
00035  *    - comment '#define OS_UNIX', uncomment '#define OS_WIN' in file 'DTrack2.cpp'
00036  *    - link with 'ws2_32.lib'
00037  *
00038  * $Id: DTrack2.cpp,v 1.10 2011/07/06 08:52:15 sebastianz Exp $
00039  */
00040

00060 DTrack2::DTrack2(const std::string& server_host, unsigned short server_port, unsigned short data_port,
00061         int data_bufsize, int data_timeout_us, int server_timeout_us)
00062 {
00063         sdk = new DTrackSDK(server_host, server_port, data_port, DTrackSDK::SYS_DTRACK_2,
00064                         data_bufsize, data_timeout_us, server_timeout_us);
00065 }
00066

00071 DTrack2::~DTrack2()
00072 {
00073         delete sdk;
00074 }

00175 
00181 bool DTrack2::receive()
00182 {
00183         if (!sdk->isLocalDataPortValid())
00184                 return false;
00185         if (!sdk->receive())
00186                 return false;
00187         // copy body data
00188         act_num_body = sdk->getNumBody();
00189         act_body.resize(act_num_body);
00190         for (int i = 0; i < act_num_body; i++)
00191         {
00192                 DTrack_Body_Type_d *dtbt = sdk->getBody(i);
00193                 dtrack2_body_type *dtbt2 = &act_body.at(i);
00194                 dtbt2->id = dtbt->id;
00195                 dtbt2->quality = (float)dtbt->quality;
00196                 for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00197                         dtbt2->loc[j] = (float)dtbt->loc[j];
00198                 for (int j = 0; j < 9; j++)
00199                         dtbt2->rot[j] = (float)dtbt->rot[j];
00200         }
00201         // copy flystick data
00202         act_num_flystick = sdk->getNumFlyStick();
00203         act_flystick.resize(act_num_flystick);
00204         for (int i = 0; i < act_num_flystick; i++)
00205         {
00206                 DTrack_FlyStick_Type_d *dtfst = sdk->getFlyStick(i);
00207                 dtrack2_flystick_type *dtfst2 = &act_flystick.at(i);
00208                 dtfst2->id = dtfst->id;
00209                 dtfst2->quality = (float)dtfst->quality;
00210                 dtfst2->num_button = dtfst->num_button;
00211                 for (int j = 0; j < DTRACK_FLYSTICK_MAX_BUTTON; j++)
00212                         dtfst2->button[j] = dtfst->button[j];
00213                 dtfst2->num_joystick = dtfst->num_joystick;
00214                 for (int j = 0; j < DTRACK_FLYSTICK_MAX_JOYSTICK; j++)
00215                         dtfst2->joystick[j] = (float)dtfst->joystick[j];
00216                 for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00217                         dtfst2->loc[j] = (float)dtfst->loc[j];
00218                 for (int j = 0; j < 9; j++)
00219                         dtfst2->rot[j] = (float)dtfst->rot[j];
00220         }
00221         // copy measurement tool data
00222         act_num_meatool = sdk->getNumMeaTool();
00223         act_meatool.resize(act_num_meatool);
00224         for (int i = 0; i < act_num_meatool; i++)
00225         {
00226                 DTrack_MeaTool_Type_d *dtmtt = sdk->getMeaTool(i);
00227                 dtrack2_meatool_type *dtmtt2 = &act_meatool.at(i);
00228                 dtmtt2->id = dtmtt->id;
00229                 dtmtt2->quality = (float)dtmtt->quality;
00230                 dtmtt2->num_button = dtmtt->num_button;
00231                 for (int j = 0; j < DTRACK_MEATOOL_MAX_BUTTON; j++)
00232                         dtmtt2->button[j] = dtmtt->button[j];
00233                 for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00234                         dtmtt2->loc[j] = (float)dtmtt->loc[j];
00235                 for (int j = 0; j < 9; j++)
00236                         dtmtt2->rot[j] = (float)dtmtt->rot[j];
00237         }
00238         // copy hand data
00239         act_num_hand = sdk->getNumHand();
00240         act_hand.resize(act_num_hand);
00241         for (int i = 0; i < act_num_hand; i++)
00242         {
00243                 DTrack_Hand_Type_d *dtht = sdk->getHand(i);
00244                 dtrack2_hand_type *dtht2 = &act_hand.at(i);
00245                 dtht2->id = dtht->id;
00246                 dtht2->quality = (float)dtht->quality;
00247                 dtht2->lr = dtht->lr;
00248                 dtht2->nfinger = dtht->nfinger;
00249                 for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00250                         dtht2->loc[j] = (float)dtht->loc[j];
00251                 for (int j = 0; j < 9; j++)
00252                         dtht2->rot[j] = (float)dtht->rot[j];
00253                 for (int k = 0; k < DTRACK_HAND_MAX_FINGER; k++)
00254                 {
00255                         for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00256                                 dtht2->finger[k].loc[j] = (float)dtht->finger[k].loc[j];
00257                         for (int j = 0; j < 9; j++)
00258                                 dtht2->finger[k].rot[j] = (float)dtht->finger[k].rot[j];
00259                         dtht2->finger[k].radiustip = (float)dtht->finger[k].radiustip;
00260                         for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00261                                 dtht2->finger[k].lengthphalanx[j] = (float)dtht->finger[k].lengthphalanx[j];
00262                         for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)
00263                                 dtht2->finger[k].anglephalanx[j] = (float)dtht->finger[k].anglephalanx[j];
00264                 }
00265         }
00266         // copy marker data
00267         act_num_marker = sdk->getNumMarker();
00268         act_marker.resize(act_num_marker);
00269         for (int i = 0; i < act_num_marker; i++)
00270         {
00271                 DTrack_Marker_Type_d *dtmt = sdk->getMarker(i);
00272                 dtrack2_marker_type *dtmt2 = &act_marker.at(i);
00273                 dtmt2->id = dtmt->id;
00274                 dtmt2->quality = (float)dtmt->quality;
00275                 for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00276                         dtmt2->loc[j] = (float)dtmt->loc[j];
00277         }
00278         return true;
00279 }

00317 
00325 dtrack2_body_type DTrack2::get_body(int id)
00326 {
00327         if (id < act_num_body) {
00328                 return act_body[id];
00329         }
00330         dtrack2_body_type dummy;
00331         memset(&dummy, 0, sizeof(dtrack2_body_type));
00332         dummy.id = id;
00333         dummy.quality = -1;
00334         return dummy;
00335 }
00336

00345 {
00346         return act_num_flystick;
00347 }

00357 dtrack2_flystick_type DTrack2::get_flystick(int id)
00358 {
00359         if (id < act_num_flystick) {
00360                 return act_flystick[id];
00361         }
00362         dtrack2_flystick_type dummy;
00363         memset(&dummy, 0, sizeof(dtrack2_flystick_type));
00364         dummy.id = id;
00365         dummy.quality = -1;
00366         return dummy;
00367 }

00445 
00453 dtrack2_marker_type DTrack2::get_marker(int index)
00454 {
00455         if (index >= 0 && index < act_num_marker) {
00456                 return act_marker[index];
00457         }
00458         dtrack2_marker_type dummy;
00459         memset(&dummy, 0, sizeof(dtrack2_marker_type));
00460         dummy.id = 0;
00461         dummy.quality = -1;
00462         return dummy;
00463 }

00518 #include <iostream>
00525 bool DTrack2::send_command(const std::string command)
00526 {
00527         return (1 == sdk->sendDTrack2Command("dtrack2 " + command, NULL));
00528 }

00537 bool DTrack2::get_lasterror(int& errorcode)
00538 {
00539         errorcode = sdk->getLastDTrackError();
00540         return (0 != errorcode);
00541 }
00542 
00543 
00550 bool DTrack2::get_lasterror(std::string& errorstring)
00551 {
00552         if (0 == sdk->getLastDTrackError())
00553                 return false;
00554         errorstring = sdk->getLastDTrackErrorDescription();
00555         return true;
00556 }
